Hi,

we are using H3 to crawl "Snapshots" of specific websites. As we are r=
unning the crawls I noticed that at the "end" of crawl (i.e. when there are=
 only a few queues left in the frontier) there are a lot of "snoozing" (ina=
ctive?) queues. Those queues wait 5 to 15 min until they start to be active=
 again. 

For example: 
Queue de,spiegel,www, (p1)
  85306 items
   wakes i=
n: 11m44s547ms
    last enqueued: http://www.spiegel.de/wikipedia/Gregor_Gy=
si.html
      last peeked: http://www.spiegel.de/wikipedia/Gregor_Gysi.html=

   total expended: 23292 (total budget: -1)
   active balance: -7950
   la=
st(avg) cost: 1(1)

How can we change that behaviour so that our jobs finis=
h faster?

Cheers,
Tino
